seed_pair.known: 你能再慢一点说一遍吗？
seed_pair.target: Could you say that again a little more slowly?

S0051: 我喜欢和朋友做有趣的事情。
I enjoy doing interesting things with my friends.
S0052: 他上周想给他的朋友写封信。
He wanted to write a letter to his friend last week.
S0053: 她想把他的信放进她的包里。
She wanted to put his letter in her bag.
put his letter in her bag
把他的信放进她的包里
S0054: 我们想多给你一点时间。
We wanted to give you a little more time.
give you a little more time
S0055: 当我没睡好的时候我不喜欢醒来。
I don't enjoy waking up when I didn't sleep very well.
when I didn't sleep very well
S0056: 这样我就能记住怎么说几个词。
So I can remember how to say a few words.
S0057: 我记不住怎么说我想说的话。
I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say.
what to say / wanted to say
S0058: 当你理解足够多的词的时候很有趣。
It's interesting when you understand enough words.
当你理解足够多的词的时候
S0059: 我知道下周我需要做什么。
I know how to do what I need to do next week.
what I need to do next week
need to do what / what...need to do
S0060: 我还不知道怎么说足够多不同的词。
I don't know how to say enough different words yet.
don't know yet / still don't know

practice_phrases: Could you?
你能吗？
Could you help?
你能帮忙吗？
Could you remember what to say?
你能记住说什么吗？
Could you wake up a little slower?
你能慢一点醒来吗？
Could you give me a little time?
你能给我一点时间吗？
Could you write a letter to your friend?
你能给你的朋友写封信吗？
Could you help me remember how to say a few words?
你能帮我记住怎么说几个词吗？
Could you give me a little more time next week?
你能下周多给我一点时间吗？
Could you help me understand what I need to do?
你能帮我理解我需要做什么吗？
Could you remember how to say what you wanted to say last week?
你能记住上周你想说的话怎么说吗？

seed_context.known: 你能再慢一点说一遍吗？
seed_context.target: Could you say that again a little more slowly?

practice_phrases: A little slower.
慢一点。
Wake up a little slower.
慢一点醒来。
Could you say that a little slower?
你能慢一点说吗？
I wanted to do it a little slower.
我想慢一点做。
Could you write the letter a little slower?
你能慢一点写信吗？
I don't enjoy doing interesting things a little slower.
我不喜欢慢一点做有趣的事情。
Could you help me remember how to say it a little slower?
你能帮我记住怎么慢一点说吗？
I wanted to give you a little time to do it a little slower.
我想给你一点时间慢一点做。
When I didn't sleep well, I wake up a little slower.
当我没睡好的时候，我慢一点醒来。
Could you say what you wanted to say a little slower next week?
你能下周慢一点说你想说的话吗？

seed_context.known: 你能再慢一点说一遍吗？
seed_context.target: Could you say that again a little more slowly?

practice_phrases: A little more slowly.
再慢一点。
Do it a little more slowly.
再慢一点做。
Could you say that a little more slowly?
你能再慢一点说吗？
I wanted to wake up a little more slowly.
我想再慢一点醒来。
Could you write the letter a little more slowly?
你能再慢一点写信吗？
I need to remember how to say it a little more slowly.
我需要记住怎么再慢一点说。
Could you help me do interesting things a little more slowly?
你能帮我再慢一点做有趣的事情吗？
I wanted to give her a little time to say it a little more slowly.
我想给她一点时间再慢一点说。
When I don't understand enough words, I need to say it a little more slowly.
当我不理解足够多的词的时候，我需要再慢一点说。
Could you remember how to say what you wanted to say a little more slowly?
你能记住怎么再慢一点说你想说的话吗？

seed_context.known: 你能再慢一点说一遍吗？
seed_context.target: Could you say that again a little more slowly?

practice_phrases: Say that again.
说一遍。
Could you say that again?
你能说一遍吗？
I can't remember, say that again.
我记不住，说一遍。
I don't know, say that again.
我不知道，说一遍。
Could you say that again a little slower?
你能慢一点说一遍吗？
I wanted you to say that again last week.
我上周想你说一遍。
Could you say that again a little more slowly?
你能再慢一点说一遍吗？
When I don't understand, I wanted you to say that again.
当我不理解的时候，我想你说一遍。
I can't remember how to say different words, could you say that again?
我记不住怎么说不同的词，你能说一遍吗？
I still don't know what you wanted to say, could you say that again?
我还不知道你想说的话，你能说一遍吗？

seed_context.known: 你能再慢一点说一遍吗？
seed_context.target: Could you say that again a little more slowly?

practice_phrases: Say that again?
说一遍吗？
Could you say that again?
你能说一遍吗？
I don't know, say that again?
我不知道，说一遍吗？
A little slower, say that again?
慢一点，说一遍吗？
Could you say that again a little slower?
你能慢一点说一遍吗？
I can't remember, could you say that again?
我记不住，你能说一遍吗？
When I don't understand, could you say that again?
当我不理解的时候，你能说一遍吗？
I still don't know enough words, could you say that again?
我还不知道足够多的词，你能说一遍吗？
I can't remember what you wanted to say, could you say that again?
我记不住你想说的话，你能说一遍吗？
When I didn't sleep well last week, I can't remember, could you say that again?
当我上周没睡好的时候，我记不住，你能说一遍吗？

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs sentences as natural language pattern examples
_instructions.lego_coverage_requirement: Practice phrases MUST use at least 60% of the LEGOs listed in recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1]
_instructions.vocabulary_source: Prioritize LEGOs from recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1] + current_seed_legos_available, then any words from sentences
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
